TheWord.Title: This is Your glory that shines on this House; this is Your glory that rests in Me. Most Dense.

Remember.Commentary: 3 biblical months and 15 days. Tokyo-Express Teriyaki House Japanese Restaurant. 660 Sacremento Street (Between Kearney & Montgomery) San Francisco CA 94111. Tel: (415) 956-3040. Fax: (415) 956-2341.

Sign.Commentary: He shall confirm a covenant with many for one week; but in the middle of the week he shall bring an end to sacrifice and offering. And on the wings of abominations shall be one who makes desolate, even until the consummation, which is determined, is poured on the desolate (Daniel 9:27).

BibleWord.Commentary: Shall consume the glory of his forest, and of his fruitful field, both soul and body: and they shall be as when a standard-bearer faints (Isaiah 10:18). Look down from heaven, and behold from the habitation of Your holiness and of Your glory: where is Your zeal and Your strength, the sounding of Your bowels and of Your mercies toward me? are they restrained? (Isaiah 63:15).

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: At the intersection of Fremont Blvd and Eggers Street, 10 birds will fly towards the right away from the side of Washington High School towards the side of Prince of Peace. A dime, D 1998, EPLU RIB USU NUM, will fall down in front of three carts in the front of the shop. Re-order: AlphabetSequence 480, and 481.
